src:
自製剁椒 做法實在簡單（視頻）

05 Nov 2019, 11:52

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月05日訊】自製剁椒
材料：紅辣椒1kg，蒜頭2整頭，薑一大塊約70g，細海鹽4-5大杓，糖2大杓，高度白酒3大杓
以下YouTube視頻示範：

text:
Homemade peppers are simple (video)

05 Nov 2019, 11:52

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 05, 2019] homemade pepper
Ingredients: 1kg of red pepper, 2 whole heads of garlic, about 70g of ginger, 4-5 large sea salt, 2 large sugar, 3 large white wine
The following YouTube video demo:
